verdict_message: You are an exceptionally strong candidate with impressive technical skills and projects directly relevant to this internship. With minor adjustments to highlight specific areas, you could be a perfect fit.
action_plan: Research key concepts and frameworks in Responsible AI, ethics, and algorithmic fairness. Be prepared to discuss your interest in these topics and how they apply to your projects.
Explore foundational concepts and applications in Behavioral Analytics or computational social science to broaden your exposure.
Consider how your existing projects, particularly the Customer Churn Predictor, can be framed to highlight aspects related to human behavior analysis or ethical considerations in data modeling.
